text:
Marilù Tolo (born 16 January 1944) is an Italian actress and model. She appeared in 64 movies between 1960 and the 1980s. She is best known for her roles in movies such as "Sweet Deceptions" (1960), "Marriage Italian Style" (1964), "The Terror of Rome Against the Son of Hercules" (1964), "Espionage in Lisbon" (1965) and "Django Kill!" (1967). Her last acting role was in 1985.
Tolo was born in Rome. She dated the fashion designer Valentino.
